item.title: 美国商会称台湾举动对外国防务公司构成障碍
item.description: 一个美国商业团体表示，台湾对与外国公司进行防务合作的规定所做的修改可能会阻碍他们与台湾的合作；而这一观点恰恰发生在中国军方展示一些重要进展之际。【原文：Changes that Taiwan made to rules for defense cooperation with foreign companies might discourage them from working with the archipelago, an American business group says — a view that comes just as China’s military shows off some key advances.】

item.title: 日本总统石破在大选前承诺到 2040 年加薪 50
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，平均工资增长 50%和实现 1 夸脱亿日元（约合 6.9 万亿美元）的经济将是今年夏天上议院选举的首要竞选承诺。【原文：A 50% increase in average pay and a ¥1 quadrillion ($6.9 trillion) economy will be the top campaign pledges for this summer’s upper house election according to Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba, as the date nears for voters to give their latest verdict on Ishiba’s administration.】

item.title: 华为创始人在贸易谈判继续进行之际挥别美国芯片禁令
item.description: 华为技术有限公司创始人任正非在《人民日报》头版发表文章，驳斥美国出口限制对中国的影响，涉足困扰华盛顿-北京贸易谈判的关键议题之一。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. founder Ren Zhengfei dismissed the impact of US export restrictions on China in a front-page People’s Daily article, wading into one of the key topics dogging Washington-Beijing trade negotiations.】

item.title: 俄罗斯对基辅和敖德萨发动大规模无人机袭击，造成 1 人死亡
item.description: 当地政府称，俄罗斯对乌克兰首都基辅和黑海城市敖德萨发动了大规模无人机袭击，留下了一片破坏痕迹，并造成至少一人死亡。【原文：Russia unleashed a sweeping drone attack on the Ukrainian capital of Kyiv and the Black Sea city of Odesa that left a trail of destruction and killed at least one person, local authorities said.】

item.title: Grab 计划发行 12.5 亿美元可转换债券用于收购
item.description: Grab Holdings Ltd. 计划出售 12.5 亿美元的可转换为股票的债券，部分用于充实其收购资金，因为有迹象表明，收购竞争对手外卖运输服务提供商 GoTo Group 的谈判已陷入僵局。【原文：Grab Holdings Ltd. is planning a $1.25 billion sale of bonds convertible into stock, partly to bulk up its warchest for acquisitions amid signs that talks to take over rival delivery-and-transport provider GoTo Group have stalled.】

item.title: 亿万富翁约翰逊家族的风险投资基金将退出中国科技控股公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，富达投资公司的亿万富翁约翰逊家族支持的一家风险投资基金计划在北京与华盛顿紧张局势加剧的情况下卸载其持有的中国技术股份。【原文：A venture capital fund backed by Fidelity Investments’ billionaire Johnson family plans to unload its Chinese technology holdings amid heightened tensions between Beijing and Washington, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度央行的现金举措助推短债做多
item.description: 在印度央行出人意料地决定向银行系统注入更多现金后，投资者将把剩余资金投入短期债券，进一步推动印度债务市场上本已备受青睐的债券市场。【原文：Investors are set to funnel surplus money into short-term bonds, further boosting an already favored play in India’s debt market, after the central bank’s surprise decision to inject more cash into the banking system.】

item.title: 交易员追踪中美贸易谈判，黄金走低
item.description: 交易员追踪中美贸易谈判的进展，双方都表示愿意做出让步，黄金因此走低。【原文：Gold edged lower as traders tracked the progress of US-China trade talks, with both sides signaling a willingness to make concessions.】

item.title: 台湾人寿五月份因汇率反弹损失翻倍
item.description: 台湾人寿保险公司 5 月份的损失比一个月前增加了一倍多，原因是本币对美元的升值打击了该公司的海外投资。【原文：Taiwan Life Insurance Co.’s losses more than doubled in May from a month earlier as the local currency’s rally against the US dollar pummeled its foreign investments.】

item.title: 澳大利亚消费者情绪在 "谨慎悲观 "中回升
item.description: 澳大利亚的消费者信心指数在 6 月份有所回升，原因是利率下调和通胀降温这两股相互冲突的力量与缓慢的经济增长和持续的贸易动荡形成了鲜明对比，从而使家庭陷入了观望状态。【原文：Australia’s consumer confidence edged up in June as the conflicting forces of lower interest rates and cool inflation ran up against slow growth and ongoing trade upheavals to place households in a holding pattern.】

item.title: 监督机构警告：经济风险加剧，爱尔兰需要财政规则
item.description: 爱尔兰财政监督机构警告说，爱尔兰政府应致力于制定国内财政规则，以便在经济进入不确定领域时更好地规划支出。【原文：The Irish government should commit to a domestic fiscal rule so it can better plan spending as the economy enters uncertain territory, the state’s fiscal watchdog warned.】

item.title: 美股失去亚洲 "逢低买入 "散户的支持
item.description: 今年 4 月，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）宣布全面征收新关税，引发全球股市暴跌。现在，他们却打起了退堂鼓。【原文：When President Donald Trump set off a global stock market slump in April with the announcement of sweeping new tariffs, small investors across Asia rushed to the US stock market to buy the dip. Now, they are backing away.】

item.title: 贝恩加强日本房地产交易，价值已达 50 亿美元
item.description: 贝恩资本（Bain Capital）在接管 Seven & i 控股公司（Seven & i Holdings Co.【原文：Bain Capital is bolstering its property investments in Japan with a pipeline of deals, fresh after taking over Seven & i Holdings Co.’s supermarkets and amassing more than $5 billion of real estate assets in the country.】

item.title: 交易员追踪中美贸易谈判，石油保持升势
item.description: 在中美贸易谈判出现进展迹象后，谈判将延长至第二天，石油保持上涨。【原文：Oil held an advance, with trade talks between the US and China set to be extended into a second day following hints of progress.】

item.title: 今年晚些时候将为 iPhone、iPad 和 Mac 带来的所有新功能
item.description: 周一，苹果公司在其年度全球开发者大会上发布了一系列软件平台更新。【原文：Apple Inc. kicked off its annual Worldwide Developers Conference on Monday with a roughly 90-minute presentation where it unveiled a slew of updates to its various software platforms.】

item.title: 哥伦比亚通胀率降幅超过预期，达到 2021 年以来最低点
item.description: 哥伦比亚 5 月份的通胀放缓幅度超过预期，达到 2021 年以来的最低水平，这可能会支持财政部长格尔曼-阿维拉（German Avila）呼吁更大幅度降息的论点。【原文：Colombian inflation slowed more than expected in May to its lowest level since 2021, potentially bolstering the arguments of Finance Minister German Avila who is calling for much deeper interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 阿根廷放宽债券拍卖规则以吸引更多美元
item.description: 阿根廷央行周一公布了一系列措施，旨在帮助这个南美国家积累更多的硬通货储备，这是该国捍卫比索所需的火力。【原文：Argentina’s central bank unveiled a slew of measures Monday aimed at helping the South American nation amass more hard-currency reserves, firepower the country needs to defend the peso.】

item.title: 英国为塞兹韦尔 C 核电厂 140 亿英镑的投资开绿灯
item.description: 英国将投资 142 亿英镑（192 亿美元）帮助建造 Sizewell C 核电厂，并称该反应堆将有助于实现丰富清洁能源的 "黄金时代"。【原文：The UK will invest £14.2 billion ($19.2 billion) to help build the Sizewell C nuclear plant, saying the reactor will help deliver “a golden age” of abundant clean energy.】

item.title: 中国动用 1.5 万亿美元基金加强住房市场支持
item.description: 中国正在利用价值 10.9 万亿元人民币（1.5 万亿美元）、经常被忽视的资金池来挽救其住房行业，为人们提供银行抵押贷款之外的另一种选择。【原文：China is tapping an often overlooked pool of funds worth 10.9 trillion yuan ($1.5 trillion) to salvage its housing sector, offering people an alternative to bank mortgages.】

item.title: 持有 4000 亿美元的日本养老基金首次聘请首席信息官
item.description: 日本养老基金正在设法在动荡的市场中提高收益，其中许多基金以前从未这样做过：任命首席投资官。【原文：Japanese pension funds are seeking to bolster returns in a volatile market by doing something many of them have never done before: appoint chief investment officers.】

item.title: 中美谈判继续，亚洲股市有望走高：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街股市温和走高之后，中美贸易谈判取得进展的暗示将提振亚洲股市开盘。【原文：Asia’s open should be buoyed by hints of progress in US-China trade talks following a muted session on Wall Street where stocks edged higher.】

item.title: S&P 下调华纳兄弟公司债券评级，将其进一步降至垃圾级
item.description: 在华纳兄弟传媒公司宣布分拆后，S&P 全球评级公司将其无担保债券评级下调至垃圾级，并表示正在考虑下调该公司的其他评级。【原文：S&P Global Ratings cut Warner Bros. Discovery Inc.’s unsecured bond ratings deeper into junk status after the media company announced it was splitting up, and said that it’s reviewing downgrading other ratings of the company.】

item.title: 苹果扩大 ChatGPT 交易，模仿谷歌尝试人工智能卷土重来
item.description:
该公司在 WWDC 上发布了多项人工智能功能，但这些功能并非活动的重点

。【原文：

The company unveiled a number of AI features at WWDC, though they weren’t the focus of event

】

item.title: 韩国最新的信贷恐慌为高风险企业融资蒙上阴影
item.description: 韩国一家私人股权所有的连锁超市出人意料地决定寻求法院主导的重组，这再次引发了当地信贷市场的不安，为李在明总统的新政府带来了早期考验。【原文：The surprise decision by a private equity-owned supermarket chain in South Korea to seek a court-led restructuring is reigniting jitters in the local credit market, creating an early test for the new administration of President Lee Jae-myung.】

item.title: 需求阴霾笼罩，中国太阳能产业蓄势待发
item.description: 中国沮丧的太阳能制造商面临着新的威胁：对其产品的需求即将下降，这很可能给已经供过于求的市场带来压力。【原文：China’s despondent solar manufacturers face a new threat — an imminent drop-off in demand for their products that’s likely to heap pressure on an already oversupplied market.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利在马斯克与特朗普交恶后寻找 xAI 债务买家
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）正在接触更广泛的投资者，以支持伊隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的人工智能初创公司xAI Corp.的50亿美元债务销售需求，这项交易为了解这位亿万富翁与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）之间的恩怨提供了一个窗口。【原文：Morgan Stanley is reaching out to a broader pool of investors to shore up demand for a $5 billion debt sale for Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI Corp., a deal that offers a window into the fallout from the billionaire’s feud with US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 新西兰威利斯希望新西兰央行增加夏季利率决议的内容
item.description: 新西兰财政部长尼古拉-威利斯（Nicola Willis）希望央行增加利率决策的频率，结束夏季休息三个月的做法，与全球同行保持一致。【原文：New Zealand Finance Minister Nicola Willis wants the central bank to increase the frequency of its rate decisions, ending its practice of a three-month summer break and bringing it in line with global peers.】

item.title: 苹果公司的 macOS Tahoe 将成为在英特尔 Mac 上运行的最终操作系统
item.description: 苹果公司（Apple Inc. ）周一在其开发者大会后表示，新的 macOS Tahoe 26 将是最终的 Mac 操作系统软件，可以在运行英特尔处理器的 Mac 上运行。【原文：Apple Inc.’s new macOS Tahoe 26 will be the final Mac operating system software that will work on Macs running Intel Corp. processors, the company said Monday following its developer conference.】

item.title: Roblox 聘用派拉蒙公司的 Naveen Chopra 担任新首席财务官
item.description: Roblox 公司任命 Paramount Global 的 Naveen Chopra 为新任首席财务官，6 月 30 日生效。【原文：Roblox Corp. tapped Paramount Global’s Naveen Chopra as its new chief financial officer, effective June 30.】

item.title: 富士媒体在激进分子的围攻下继续运作房地产分拆业务
item.description: 富士媒体控股公司（Fuji Media Holdings Inc.【原文：Fuji Media Holdings Inc.’s incoming president said “all options” regarding its real estate operations remain on the table, including a possible spinoff along the lines of activist investor demands.】
